name: pgbray4967
text: We have ordered Snappy quite a few times since they have "re-opened" and we have not been disappointed. The staff is super friendly especially the manager. The quality of the pizza and calzones have been great. If you haven't tried it since they re-opened you should - try the loaded baked potato and bacon - excellent!

name: Justin True
text: Tried for the first time in very long. New management has definitely made improvements.

name: Dale Shell
text: Great pizza

name: Melissa Dixon
text: Independence Snappy day manager should be fired! No clue what she is doing. Decent lunch buffet but does offer as much as Ft Wright. May never eat there again!

name: David Cain
text: Edit: See the end for my most recent update and why I changed my star rating from 1 star to 5! …More

name: D V
text: I’ve loved Snappy’s since I was a kid and worked at one during high school. I still order it every time I come back in town. Unfortunately, this particular location is terrible. They get my order wrong almost every time, and their delivery …More

name: Brandon Ryan
text: What restaurant closes at 8? Usually get carry out from here, when you can actually catch the place open. The one time I did get delivery, it took an hour and a half. I live about 5 minutes away.

name: John Ticherich
text: One worker had half of his rear end hanging out. Salad bowl was almost empty. Never refilled on my visit. Only 1 1/2 pizzas ready on arrival for lunch buffet. Dessert was not made until I was ready to leave.

name: Sharon Hensley
text: Good food friendly people who work there

name: Karley Bishop
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery and when we got it it was super under cooked. Called to see if they would make us a new one and they said yes but asked us to come pick it up. So we got there (after hours) the person was standing outside …More

name: Nishant Puri
text: Forget the old reviews looks like this Snappy is now Under New Management! The restaurant has gotten a facelift...new decor looks nice to sit and eat with the whole family. Also, I love it that the buffet is back with best price around the …More

name: Courtney Jackson
text: Just picked up my pizza from Snappy’s! The atmosphere was super friendly and helpful! The pizza is delicious by the way and I highly recommend!

name: tru daddy
text: The food is great. New owner who does things right. And good staff.

name: Enflictt
text: I was surprised to see that they are under new management, the pizza and the store has made so much improvements! Overall I had an amazing experience! I highly recommend!

name: Jason Rudd
text: Horrible attitudes, service, and atmosphere. The owner of Snappy Tomato Pizza should be ashamed. If you're going to have franchises you should at least make sure your restaurants are keeping your reputation good. Unfortunately the …More

name: Perl Marwah
text: The store's under a new management and you can tell!!! They re did the dining area, the staff is super friendly and food is great. And not to mention the buffet is back!!!

name: MIssy
text:
Definately didnt even earn a 1 star, but that was my lowest option.
Placed an online order at 7:44pm, states would be delivered at 8:27pm. At 8:55, called stores to see where order was and a female answered the phone and when I …More

name: Cynthia Jones
text: I wouldn't be surprised if this location were to close within the next few months. I was told today they no longer have a buffet. They bring your pizza out already in a box. You have to go get your own plates and plastic ware.  I had to go …More

name: Nancy Kenter
text: The new management is fantastic. Pizza much better.

name: Malinda Cline
text: Usually I am extremely happy with snappy pizza but this is the first time I have been disappointed with my order. I did not receive the crust I asked for, I had to wait for over an hour for my pizza to be delivered, and the quality of pizza I am use to with Snappy was not there.

name: Chris Eaves
text: The service is worse than the food, which is pretty pathetic. Save yourself the disappointment and go somewhere else.

name: zach Nageleisen
text: Good but needs more options to pick from on the Buffet

name: Gina Monson
text: Called before arriving and the food was not ready. Could not even start eating a salad as it was not prepared. Staff unwrapped lettuce and did not rinse before putting on buffet. Will not be going back..

name: Sara Antrobus
text: The kid working was only interested in hanging out with his girlfriend outside the door. He wasn't happy with having to wait on me and when I got my pizza home I realized the dough was raw in the middle there wasn't even a manager to complain to I wont go to this location ever again. I wish i could leave 0 stars.

name: Adam Steele
text: Currently eating here for the 4th day in a row. Pizza is great and the staff is awesome!

name: CJ Hanson
text: Lovely little restaurant with good food and nice staff.

name: Jerry waddle
text: Great family friendly restaurant

name: Aman Marwah
text: Great staff, delicious food!

name: Mathias Reinhart
text: New owner. And the place is better than ever

name: Jason Grycko
text: Awful customer service. Pizza was delivered incorrectly, late, and cold! The pizza tasted like flavored cardboard with some sauce thrown in. Do not recommend!

name: Edy Smith
text: This place is gross! Ordered wings twice, both times asked for them extra crispy and both times they were cold and soggy. Second order was pickup, place was being run by 2 people under the age of 20, didn't have a clue what was going on, and it was a super busy night for fast food in NKY.

name: Will Lloyd
text: Great place, lots of great food and the new ownership an management are making a change!

name: Brad Vann
text: So me and my kids r eating inside the snappy tomatoe in independence. My girls used their restroom and they were all out of soap. So I come out n tell the girl they r out of soap in the bathroom. The whole time we r there (1hr) she doesn't …More

name: Montana Jackson
text: literally anytime you try to order food from here they take the order and then instead of notifying you they aren’t delivering it they take the money and you have to call to hear that the store is “closed” at four in the afternoon

name: maurice mitchell
text: Would have given 0 stars if I could. Waited 2 hrs. for a Beast pizza to be delivered. Called to cancel 90 mins after i ordered because I was told 35-45mins. Pizza arrives after 2 hrs cold and unlike any other Beast Ive had. Owner promised …More

name: Casi Witherite
text: Pizza was okay. Customer service needs improvement. In order to get promotional coupons, I was told to order online after giving them my order over the phone. Treated like a dumbass from the manager as well because I had issues adding toppings to the hoagie via my online order with my phone. Maybe if snappys had an app...

name: David Alcantar
text: I love their pizza, but this is far from the best Snappy's. For example, they do not take coupons and specials that other Snappy's offer and their customer service could be friendlier. It is disappointing because this one is much closer, …More

name: Doris Bankston
text: I love Snappy's pizza!

name: nick little
text: Disgrace  to the snappy name had pizza delivered took an hour and 5 min to get to me ordered online apperently from the wrong store even though i called 2 stores to see where i should order from and got no help from either store as to what …More

name: Mike Gossett
text: Rude, offensive people that bully women. Do not give this place your money. Let it rot.

name: Edward Macht
text: First time using butfay

name: Tammy Dean
text: Pizza was not prepared as ordered and did not taste fresh. Very disappointed.

name: Rod eversole
text: The owner over charge me 58.00 I called to see if I could get my money back he called me a mfer screaming slamming the phone down. I see why that store sucks so bad NASTY

name: Sara Rowe
text: So so

name: Carol Kincaid
text: Loved it

name: Ronnie B
text: So I order food at 2pm it's now 3:22 they tell me the driver should be here but they have no way of tracking him and here I sit will never  order here again the worse service ever thanks for making my kids wait

name: Sara Dillion
text: Poor customer service, food is always wilted or not prepared right

name: Ron Calhoun
text: Buffet lunch, ask for your favorite pizza.
